subject: Marketing
title: Empathy in Copywriting
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Empathy in Copywriting.

hook.text: The best copywriter on the team was the one who spent the most time talking to customers.

buildup.text: Empathy means understanding the reader's pain, fears, and desires before writing a single word.

discovery.text: Copy that mirrors the reader's own internal dialogue creates an instant feeling of being understood.

twist.text: You can't empathize from a conference room. The best copy comes from customer research.

climax.text: When readers feel understood, trust follows. When trust exists, selling becomes easy.

punchline.text: Understand them first. Then write to them.

quiz.question: Why is empathy essential in effective copywriting?
options: Copy that mirrors internal dialogue makes readers feel understood
Empathetic copy is easier and faster to write
Regulations require empathy in all marketing materials
